channel.title: Looking for a somewhat old-school server to play, been away from RSPS for years
channel.description:
Hey guys, I've been away from the rsps community for a couple years and I'm looking for a somewhat old-school server. Doesn't have to be 2006 but I don't want all the new shit. Hopefully I can find a server with some more mature kids, I'm 19.. Don't feel like watching 13 year olds spamming 24/7. Preferably around 10 - 30 players.
If you know of any that fit this description please let me know! Thanks.

item.title: Looking for a somewhat old-school server to play, been away from RSPS for years
item.dc:creator: @z z
item.description:
@z wrote:

Emps-World is pretty decent, but its kinda gone to shit lately

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a somewhat old-school server to play, been away from RSPS for years
